That's fantastic news! Congratulations on making progress with your forehand and serve! Three weeks is a great milestone, and it's wonderful to see your hard work paying off.

Remember, consistency and practice are key to solidifying new skills. Keep working on your technique, and don't be afraid to challenge yourself to try new things. You might consider setting specific goals for your next lesson or practice session to help you stay focused and motivated.

Also, don't underestimate the importance of positive self-talk and mental preparation. Visualize yourself hitting strong forehands and serves, and remind yourself that you're capable of continued improvement.

What's been the most challenging part of your tennis journey so far, and what are you looking forward to improving on in the coming weeks?
